main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurity] Script Date: 05/03/2012 10:05:27 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurity]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurity]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurity] Script Date: 05/03/2012 10:05:27 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurity]( [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimLoanID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [AccountBSB] [varchar](50) NOT NULL, [AccountNo] [varchar](20) NOT NULL, [SecurityNo] [varchar](20) NOT NULL, [DimSecurityID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimOrganisationID] [bigint] not null, [DimReportingDateID] [bigint] not null, [DebtChargePosition] [varchar](20) NULL, [ProportionalValutionAmt] [Decimal](19,6) null, [IsIncluded] bit CONSTRAINT [PK_tblFactLoanSecurity] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimPoolID] ASC, [DimLoanID] ASC, [DimSecurityID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 70) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
